TranslateTo.ElementName: EA unique identifier, EA_ID, not recognised. Make sure it’s exactly the same as given in your original permit, licence or mineral extractions agreement.
Return type is missing or incorrect. You must give a valid return type exactly as it’s given in the EA controlled list.
Monitoring point is missing or incorrect.
Date is missing or incorrect. You need to format the date as 'YYYY-MM-DD' eg 2015-10-31.
Parameter is missing or incorrect. See the EA controlled list for allowable parameters.
Numerical value is missing or incorrect. You must give a numerical value for your data. It can include zeros.
Reference period not recognised. See controlled list 4 for allowable reference periods.
Monitoring period data not recognised. You need to format the time as hh:mm:ss using the 24-hour clock.
Monitoring end date not recognised. You need to format the date as 'YYYY-MM-DD' eg 2015-10-31.
Sample reference not recognised. Check your data.
Data not recognised. Check your data.
Text value not recognised. You must give a valid return type exactly as it’s given in this list supplied by EA.
Site name not recognised. Make sure it’s exactly the same as given in your original permit, licence or mineral extractions agreement.
Monitoring standard or method not recognised. See controlled list 6 for allowable monitoring standards or methods.
Comments should be free text and related to another field in the row of data.
Commercial in confidence data not recognised. You can only give these values: Yes, No, True, False and Null.
The CAS number is not recognised. See controlled list 3 for CAS numbers.
Waste Recovery and Disposal code not recognised. Check your data.
